title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\PurchaseTransaction
name: PurchaseTransaction
description:
A transaction represents the entire purchase transaction.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.PurchaseTransaction

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.id
params.description: The transaction ID with a length limit of 128 characters.

params.name: data.revenue
params.description: Required. Total non-zero revenue or grand total associated with the transaction. This value include shipping, tax, or other adjustments to total revenue that you want to include as part of your revenue calculations.

params.name: data.tax
params.description: All the taxes associated with the transaction.

params.name: data.cost
params.description: All the costs associated with the products. These can be manufacturing costs, shipping expenses not borne by the end user, or any other costs, such that: * Profit = [revenue][google.cloud.retail.v2.PurchaseTransaction.revenue] - [tax][google.cloud.retail.v2.PurchaseTransaction.tax] - [cost][google.cloud.retail.v2.PurchaseTransaction.cost]

params.name: data.currency_code
params.description: Required. Currency code. Use three-character ISO-4217 code.
